author: arkurth
msg: Added timestamps to cached result from utils.pm::get_*_info() subroutines. Added timestamp check if cached data is returned. If cached data is too old it is retrieved again.
Updated get_computer_info to call get_production_imagerevision_info when assembling the nextimage info.

author: markt
msg: Clarify how context paths are derived.

author: cmpilato
msg: On the '1.7.x-issue4332' branch: Fix issue #4332 ("neon OPTIONS
request on repository root causes authz access denied").
(svn_ra_neon__do_check_path): When checking a path against an
invalid revision number (that is, HEAD), query its public URL rather
than trying to resolve HEAD into a fixed revision number and then
querying the baseline URL for the path in that revision.

author: markt
msg: Clarify how context paths are derived.

author: cmpilato
msg: On the '1.7.x-issue4332' branch, merge from trunk r1452967, which
added a regression test for this issue.
